title: Oil Change Due
message: Vehicle VH01 has reached 250 operating hours. Oil change maintenance is now due.

title: Low Fuel Level
message: Vehicle VH02 fuel level has dropped below 15%. Immediate refueling required.

title: Unauthorized Vehicle Movement
message: Vehicle VH03 detected movement outside of scheduled operating hours. Possible theft or unauthorized use.

title: Engine Overheating
message: Vehicle VH04 engine temperature exceeded normal operating range during field operation. Engine shutdown required.

title: GPS Tracker Offline
message: GPS tracker for vehicle VH05 has been offline for more than 2 hours. Last known location: Field A-12.

title: Hydraulic System Leak
message: Hydraulic fluid leak detected on vehicle VH01. Immediate inspection and repair required to prevent damage.

title: Abnormal Fuel Consumption
message: Vehicle VH02 showing 35% higher fuel consumption than normal. Possible engine efficiency issue.

title: Operator License Expiry
message: Operator OP02 driving license expires in 7 days. License renewal required for continued operation.

title: Database Backup Failed
message: Automated daily database backup failed. Manual backup required to ensure data integrity.
